name: The Secret Club
description: You're at your local club, The Stallion, on a busy Tuesday night to celebrate your friend Theo's birthday. Everyone's all getting a little drunk and after a trip to the bathroom you find something... A dead body.... But who is it? Who did it and why? And what the hell is up with the creepy guy in the corner of the room? This wasn't quite the midweek-birthday celebrations you were expecting. Play along but try to not get yourself killed!
